name: Erika Resnick
text: The pizzas were delivered half an hour later than expected. I got a notification that my order was on the way 35 minutes before it arrived. It should take only 10 minutes to get here. The pizza was barely warm.

name: Al Faymore
text: Quick and friendly service.  Quirky and fun murals on parking lot back walls!  Table and booth seats weren't well cleaned from previous customers. The restaurant is in need of remodeling or at least cleaned well to get rid of all the stickiness.  Parking lot needs a re-do too.  Building is ratty around the edges.

name: Cary Smith
text: My food arrived hot. The order was correct. delivery was punctual. Everything tasted great.

name: Marilyn Williams
text: Love to order carry out..Ppl that work here are the best! I always go to deals on the app. It's way cheeper than if you just order off the menu.

name: Tom Pfrogner
text: The quality of pizza from pizza hut has gone down hill bad. The only reason i even bother anymore is 10 dollars for a large 3 topping pizza is not bad but seeing how bad the quality is getting i feel pizza hut will be closing soon

name: kid watch
text: Fast. Friendly. Good deals. Curbside pickup available.

name: Sharon Bone
text: The pizza arrived hot and on time.  I like to take advantage of the specials.

name: William Gallishen
text: I stopped for a pizza and got curbside pickup and when i pulled up the car that got there after me got their food first and no one even noticed i was there, i had to call 5 times just to get someone to answer to let them know i was there …More

name: Cynthia Shugart
text: We switched to using this Pizza Hut because the one that delivers to us messed our order up the 2 different times we ordered from them. This Pizza Hut is THE BEST in my opinion.

name: Hollie Shadd
text: Pizza was greasy and cheese was thick but wins are AMAZING

name: AutumnHorror
text: I absolutely love this pizza hut, we've been coming here for as long as I can remember. Hopefully it stays around, with all the other locations closing. 😢

name: Ryan Gregory
text: Yesterday I had a visit and the costumer service was amazing,  food was out quick and tasted very good, and the tables and seats were very clean. I definitely will be back soon.

name: Angela Murray
text: Was visiting family and went to Pizza Hut for dinner.  We dined in and had great customer service and the restaurant was clean. The food came out hot and the breadsticks were good. Our waitress checked on us several times and did awesome! Will definitely be back.

name: Bob Klimek
text: Took my family here for dinner and had the pleasure of meeting the manager Amanda. She was so polite and informative. The food was delicious all of the employees seemed to have a high morale and was family oriented. I will definitely be recommending this pizza hut to others.

name: rocket star
text: I placed an order online early , like around 11:30 am to be delivered at 4:45 pm , And they still didn't show up on time,  they had almost 5 hours lead way, And still late with my order, unreal. And gave drivery a hefty tip online before my …More

name: Karen ODonnell
text: Why did Pizza hut do away with the salad bar? Our family loved with Pizza. It was always busy.

name: Robert Vasko
text: Great tasting pizza. A little heavy on the sodium If your pre hypertension or have high blood pressure. They have some options that are healthier.

text: Ive ordered from this location several times over the last few years but the last 4 times have been taxing. There are alot of other options in the area and i dont think this location cares about gainong my repeat business. 2 times before …More

name: Kathy Burke
text:
The manager of this location needs retrained.
She screams across the dining room reprimanding and belittling the employees. Totally unprofessional. …More

name: Philip Kunkle
text:
Food: (3/5) About what you'd expect of a Pizza Hut. Not my favorite, but I know plenty that love their crispy oily crust and their sugary sauce.
Price: (3/5) Usually cheap prices, as they're always having some sort of sale or …More

text: The staff is efficient and friendly..our pizza was made to order just as we requested, served hot and fresh...the crust was tender and tasty..the cheese was melted and creamy and the sauce was perfection...this particular unit is clean and always has a fresh stocked salad bar....worth the stop..
